mapper.update: update patent_pdf_apply set apply_name = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_auth_count_2022 = #{patentAuthCount2022,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select apply_id, apply_name, patent_auth_count_2022, `status`, create_time, update_time from patent_pdf_apply
select * from patent_pdf_apply where status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by patent_auth_count_2022 desc limit 1;
